DOC.brief_summary: Motivated report improvement aerobic fitness executive function 6-month aerobic walk intervention normal sedentary elderly , conduct Phase I/II study investigate effect aerobic exercise motor function , cognition , quality life mild-moderate patient Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) . To identify best method deliver fitness training , also aim compare safety , tolerability , fitness benefit different train method ( continuous/moderate intensity vs. interval/alternating low vigorous intensity ) exercise setting ( individual vs. group ) . Interval train reportedly facilitate high fitness gain continuous training . Group training may promote success social interaction , whereas individual training offer great flexibility . Details study find publication : Phase I/II randomize trial aerobic exercise Parkinson disease community set . Uc EY , Doerschug KC , Magnotta V , Dawson JD , Thomsen TR , Kline JN , Rizzo M , Newman SR , Mehta S , Grabowski TJ , Bruss J , Blanchette DR , Anderson SW , Voss MW , Kramer AF , Darling WG . Neurology . 2014 Jul 29 ; 83 ( 5 ) :413-25. doi : 10.1212/WNL.0000000000000644 . Epub 2014 Jul 2 . PMID : 24991037
DOC.detailed_description: Participants : The participant recruit Spring 2009 , 2010 , 2011 regional newspaper advertisement solicitation Movement Disorders Clinic University Iowa Veterans Affairs Medical Center Iowa City . We phone screen respondent evaluate eligible candidate in-person use clinical examination , MMSE , 12-lead ECG , blood count biochemistry , follow graded exercise test use cycle ergometry within one week start intervention . At visit , obtain body weight height , heart rate blood pressure 5 minute supine rest [ Goldberg et al . 1988 ] 3 minute stand . Throughout study , medication participant continue manage treat neurologist . Inclusion criterion : Idiopathic PD ; Hoehn Yahr Scale I-III ; men woman age 50-80 ; stable dopaminergic treatment regimen least 4 week prior baseline require adjustment . Exclusion criterion : Current participation aerobic exercise program ; Mini Mental Status Exam score < 24 ; confound medical , orthopedic psychiatric disorder ; cardiac abnormality cycle ergometry . Design : Initial design 2x2 randomized trial different training method ( continuous vs. interval ) setting ( individual vs. group ) . Sample size estimate use 80 % power detect effect size 0.66 SD VO2max ( estimate improvement=10 % /estimated SD change=15 % ) within arm alpha=0.05 attrition rate 25 % . During first two year , participant randomize block four continuous interval training . Logistical factor ( e.g. , rural residence ) preclude randomization group setting , lead convenience-based assignment first year , drop group set afterwards . In third year , participant assign continuous arm preliminary analyse prior data raise safety concern interval training . Intervention : The maximal heart rate ( HRmax ) exercise prescription base age [ Goldberg , Elliot , Kuehl1988 ] reduce 20 % participant use beta-blockers [ Wonisch et al . 2003 ] . The duration exercise session ( 3x/week ) advance 15 45 minute first 6 week . The goal continuous training remain within 70-80 % HRmax throughout session . Interval trainee alternate every 3 minute slow ( 60-70 % HRmax ) faster ( 80-90 % HRmax ) walk [ Wisloff et al . 2007 ] . We emphasize parameter guidance participant give best effort without feel uncomfortable unsafe . Participants ask wear electronic heart rate walk speed monitor ( Polar RS400 , Kempele , Finland ) fill diaries session . A trainer facilitate group train track collect monitor data exercise diary . Trainers conduct home visit individual arm participant choose walk route ( primary outdoor route alternative indoor route ) orient participant safe exercise procedure , follow biweekly home visit monitor safety compliance . Efficacy Measures : The participant test usual antiparkinsonian regimen , always adequate symptom control allow comfortable participation protocol , baseline end intervention evaluator blind treatment arm , pre-post training status . Aerobic fitness : Oxygen uptake ( VO2 ) measure expired air sample breath-by-breath basis cycle ergometry . We verify maximal effort 2 3 criterion meet [ Balady et al . 2010 ] : 1 ) plateau VO2 two workload , 2 ) respiratory exchange ratio â‰¥1.10 , 3 ) HR > 85 % age predict HRmax . Cognition : Due sensitivity Eriksen 's flanker task performance change aerobic fitness status [ Colcombe et al . 2004 ; Kluding et al . 2011 ] , chose change Percent Increase Score ( PIS ) flanker task primary cognitive outcome measure . Participants ask identify orientation central arrow cue ( ' < ' ' > ' ) , flank side two arrow cue either pointed direction ( congruent : < < < < < ) different direction ( incongruent : > > < > > ) . Using reaction time ( RT ) congruent incongruent trial , PIS calculate = ( ( RT_incongruent - RT_congruent ) / RT_congruent ) * 100 . [ Colcombe , Kramer , Erickson , Scalf , McAuley , Cohen , Webb , Jerome , Marquez , Elavsky2004 ] The Stroop test use another measure inhibition . We assess set shift use Wisconsin Card Sorting Test Trail-Making Test ( B-A ) , [ Uc , Rizzo , Johnson , Dastrup , Anderson , Dawson2009 ] visual perception use Judgment Line Orientation Complex Figure Test ( CFT ) -Copy , verbal memory use Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test , visual memory use CFT-Recall , language use Controlled Oral Word Association Test , [ Uc , Rizzo , Johnson , Dastrup , Anderson , Dawson2009 ] general cognition use Montreal Cognitive Assessment . [ Chou et al . 2010 ] Parkinsonism : Unified Parkinson 's Disease Rating Scale time motor test ( 7m Walk finger tap ) , [ Defer et al . 1999 ] Functional Reach test balance , [ Uc , Rizzo , Johnson , Dastrup , Anderson , Dawson2009 ] total daily levodopa equivalent , [ Tomlinson et al . 2010 ] patient diary [ Hauser et al . 2004 ] . Quality life : Fatigue Severity Scale , [ Friedman et al . 2011 ] Geriatric Depression Scale , [ Uc , Rizzo , Johnson , Dastrup , Anderson , Dawson2009 ] PD Quality Life Scale ( PDQUALIF ) [ Welsh et al . 2003 ] . Statistical analysis Two-sample t-tests , Wilcoxon Rank-Sum , Fisher 's Exact test use compare baseline feature exercise characteristic outcomes different treatment arm , completers dropout , compare baseline cognitive performance PD participant control drive study . [ Uc , Rizzo , Johnson , Dastrup , Anderson , Dawson2009 ] Regression method use adjust comparison age , education , gender . As treatment arm design deliver similar average aerobic intensity , plan pool priori completers throughout study analyze effect aerobic exercise higher statistical power . We use Wilcoxon Signed Ranks test pair t-tests compare final vs. baseline outcome . When significant change outcomes observe , use regression model assess adjust effect different setting train method , calendar year , change levodopa equivalent . We also use Pearson correlation regression model quantify association change outcome change aerobic fitness . The analysis magnetic resonance image study biomarkers continue publish future . DOC.criteria: Veteran nonveteran ; Presence 3 cardinal feature Parkinson 's disease ( rest tremor , bradykinesia , rigidity ) , asymmetrical ; Hoehn Yahr Scale stage IIII ; Men woman age 5080 capable perform plan exercise program ; Intention remain local area study period ; Stable dopaminergic treatment regimen least 4 week prior baseline without clinical need medication adjustment time screen Secondary parkinsonism ; Parkinsonplus syndromes ; MMSE score < 24 ; Participating aerobic exercise program ; An unstable dosage drug active central nervous system ( e.g. , anxiolytic , antidepressant ) 60 day baseline visit ; Participation drug study use investigational drug within 30 day screen ; structural brain disease ; Active epilepsy ; Acute illness active , confound medical , neurological , musculoskeletal condition ; alcoholism form drug addiction ; Inability complete grade exercise test ; Lack medical clearance pulmonologist ; Intention move take > 1 month vacation study period ; Contraindications MRI claustrophobia require sedation
